response.message:
"Over the course of eight weeks, six developers..." 

I read that as six to eigth weeks.

Wow, awesome work guys! Andela is a great compaany.

Last year, I attended a hackathon organised by them - my first experience of such an event having watched many hackathons over Youtube.

What that organisation is doing in Africa, specifically Nigeria, is that they are essentially fostering the development of an ecosystem of 'hackers', and that is truely remarkable. We need more organisations like this in Africa, so I commend the Andela team.

I must say I am really impressed by their fast-paced growth. Go Andela!
It never ceases to amaze me how many awesome things Stack Exchange does. Congratulations to everyone involved for making the world a better place!

What, no draw app open? What kind of company do you think you are that tries to do *productive* work?!?!?!

Seriously guys, nice work. This is cool stuff you're doing. +42
After reading the post, I can take some educated guess, but it would have really helped, if you had made a brief introduction to what Andela is in the beginning.
@David Funny, I read it as "six to eight developers".

Lucky them. I wonder how can I be part of it. I need to learn a lot but almost no help here. Whatever I learnt, I learnt through web and SE sites. But self learning is very slow process compared to learning one on one.

Wonderful... I've always followed this belief! 
Thanks to the team for the efforts.
